name: Skeletony's Adventure
description: Your name is Skeletony, and you annoyed Serpentina (ex wife), and tripped and fell into an infinite time loop (woopsie). This game has two of the previous themes of the GMTK game jams "joined together", (I would have liked all 4, but I couldn't think of how to mix all three together at all.). I mixed together "genre without a mechanic" and "only one", ((kinda)dungeon crawler without attacks, and only one slightly changing map.
